additionalType.name: additionalType
additionalType.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

description.name: description
description.description: A short description of the item.

image.name: image
image.description: URL of an image of the item.

sameAs.name: sameAs
sameAs.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or official website.

carbohydrateContent.name: carbohydrateContent
carbohydrateContent.description: The number of grams of carbohydrates.

cholesterolContent.name: cholesterolContent
cholesterolContent.description: The number of milligrams of cholesterol.

fatContent.name: fatContent
fatContent.description: The number of grams of fat.

fiberContent.name: fiberContent
fiberContent.description: The number of grams of fiber.

proteinContent.name: proteinContent
proteinContent.description: The number of grams of protein.

saturatedFatContent.name: saturatedFatContent
saturatedFatContent.description: The number of grams of saturated fat.

servingSize.name: servingSize
servingSize.description: The serving size, in terms of the number of volume or mass

sodiumContent.name: sodiumContent
sodiumContent.description: The number of milligrams of sodium.

sugarContent.name: sugarContent
sugarContent.description: The number of grams of sugar.

transFatContent.name: transFatContent
transFatContent.description: The number of grams of trans fat.

unsaturatedFatContent.name: unsaturatedFatContent
unsaturatedFatContent.description: The number of grams of unsaturated fat.
